Posts.Content: well here iam, on oxygen still, drain and fluids. went well. my scar is massive! straight line from cleavage to armpit. think cuz I had all nodes removed. but sore but feeling ok. glad to have the heart of the cancer gone x
Posts.Title: had my mastectomy today

Posts.Content: also doctor said today the op went well and that some of the nodes looked normal so that's good sign x
Posts.Title: had my mastectomy today

Posts.Content: just been reading your blog. so touching and such a brave lady xx
Posts.Title: One Month Later - Mastectomy photos if anyone would like to see

Posts.Content: hey went doctors at 9:40. they referring me to breast specialist. they said take a week for appointment come through. well get home and hospital just rung with appointment. lol. fast. it's Tuesday 7th 2pm x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thankyou. I'm calling doctors first thing tomorow once open. i do wish I did regular checks but never occurred to me because of my age x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thanks everyone. it freaked me a little if I'm honust that I got hospital call before I even got home. dr said a week. but at least I know when. x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thanku everyone. your all amazing. I will keep you all posted with outcome xx
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thanku. I will. I need to know as hard not to worry. I'm just panicked a little has its so hard and not smooth surface and feels roughly 2" big although doesn't feel perfectly round. I don't know how I missed it! I shower with one those scrunchies so wouldn't of felt it showering. I have no pain feel fine x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thanku guys. u r all so amazing and brave xx
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: lastnight I was relaxing with my son with a DVD and I casually scratched my breast, that's when I noticed. I felt again and it's a hard non movable lump in my right breast at the top deep under my nipple slightly. about size of a 50p. no pain. I thought I'd check the other breast and armpit and that's fine and squishy. I then checked my right armpit and discovered swollen lymth nodes to. so I have a solid lump in right breast and swollen lymth nodes in right arm pit. I know you can get lumps if menstrual cycle due or on. but I had mine end a week ago. also I'm not on the pill. I have the contraceptive implant in my arm which I've 2.3yrs now with no issues. I'm 26 have 2 beautiful children. youngest is 3. i breast fed both. honust opinions please. I know people will be kind not to worry me or upset. I'm ready to fight this battle if it is. many thanks x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: nipple not nipples I meant. I have to go for a internal scan of my ovary x
Posts.Title: results of ct scan showed something on my ovary

Posts.Content: I'm 26. I have IDC I had mastectomy on the 6th feb and all nodes removed. operation went well. had mastectomy as had spread to nipples and tissue around lump. I had a total of 7 lymph nodes 2 were cancerous. bone scan clear. ct scan showed organs are fine but showed lump on ovary. I had my ovaries scanned before a few times and nothing on them. last time was scanned when was in early pregnancy with my now 3 year old. I'm hoping just a cyst. I start chemo end of march. then radiotherapy and hormone treatment. I'm ER positive. I've recovered well from mastectomy, just my arm still recovering xx
Posts.Title: results of ct scan showed something on my ovary

Posts.Content: this is a good question and peoples responses has reassured me as I too am in same boat. I'm waiting for core biopsy results and worried a little the doctors may be playing it down so not to worry me. they said there treating mine as fibroadnosis and biopsy will confirm. they said if it confirmed it is they will remove so it doesn't cause me problems down the line as I'm only 26 x
Posts.Title: Do docs play down cancer until they get biopsy results or can they...

Posts.Content: the MRI showed no other tumours but showed the tumour is affecting other tissue so got to have a mastectomy on the 6th feb on the bad breast. also biopsy confirmed cancer in my nodes so having all lymph nodes removed at same time. 4-8 weeks after op will start chemo and after radiotherapy and hormone treatment. then once all that's completed will have the other breast removed and both reconstructed. I got to have a ct scan bone scan soon as that will tell them if spread, still don't know yet
Posts.Title: op date.

Posts.Content: I'm feeling really positive thou. more in control. as got to choose if wanted chemo followed by mastectomy or mastectomy followed by chemo. and have a proper plan in place. I feel a bit more on control x
Posts.Title: op date.

Posts.Content: grade means how fast growing 3 being highest. and stage is how big the tumour and if or how many lymph node involvement. I'm grade 3 still waiting on stage but I know I'm prob stage 3 as my lymph nodes are effected and my lump 3 cm and started spread to surrounding breast tissue so I got a mastectomy and lymph node clearance on the 6th, I'm only 26 x
Posts.Title: Cancer stage, cancer grade

Posts.Content: also cuz there are back logged she said. I feel sick. x
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: thankyou. it worries me as they said that if good news they won't ring they will send a letter to say all clear. and if they were worrying the results then it wouldn't be an up to 6 week wait it would be much faster. I was feeling sure it was nothing sinister but now I'm not sure. suppose every doctors/hospitals are different. thanku all so much. I'm sure if it is bad news that I will have so much support. thanks again xx
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: got a call this morning. biopsy results are in (had biopsy on Tuesday 6 days ago) and dr wants to see me to discuss the results. won't tell me on the phone. I'm so scared. they told me that up to 6 weeks wait for results as there not worried because of my age. I got to go in Friday at 12. x
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: thanku. my OH is coming with me. he was there for the biopsy and heard all what the doctor said on that Tuesday and he is even surprised and worried because of what they said to what's happening now. hopefully the doctor made mistake in what she said and maybe there not too busy and maybe they call in people to tell them it's benign even thou they said they would just send a letter. just have to play the waiting game. my sons birthday tomorrow so have a cake to Cake to make today and his birthday to distract me xx
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: thankyou everyone xx
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: thanks everyone. so nerve racking xx
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: hiya. I'm 26 with 2 children and was diagnosed with grade 3 invasive ductal carcona cancer (ignore spelling lol) on the 17th January. I found the lump on 28th dec. on 6th feb I had mastectomy as not enough clear margins to remove just the lump also started to spread to my nipple. also all lymph nodes removed as spread. I knew I'd be having mastectomy but plan was to have both off at end of treatment then reconstruct straight away. but now got to live with 1 boob till all treatment finished. I start chemo in about 4-6 weeks. got to see gyny first to see if want eggs harvested because of my age. my bone scan was clear. I'm er positive, and I had 7 lymph nodes in total and 2 were cancerous. I'm recovering well from mastectomy. my arm hurts the most but it's bearable. my scar is healed. it is hard when you have children as you worry about them but you will be amazed at how they cope and my children have been like little nurses lol. they are age 6 and 3. good luck. there's a group on facebook you should join. called 'younger breast cancer network (uk) secret group'.
Posts.Title: just diagnosed with breast cancer,need support

Posts.Content: thankyou so much. such lovely women. I'm just up and down, one minute I'm worried the next I'm like its fine it be ok what am I worried about. my poor OH, i must be driving him loopey lol xx
Posts.Title: will they be able to tell me something on the day of my tests?

Posts.Content: I got scan ect on Tuesday to investigate hard non movable painless lump. the odds are in my favour but always going to have what if in back of my head. will they be able to tell me something if it looks suspicious there and then? I just hate to go there have tests and them tell me nothing untill biopsy results in week later. so hard
Posts.Title: will they be able to tell me something on the day of my tests?

Posts.Content: thankyou. I never thought I'd ever be in this position even if it is good news. scary stuff finding a lump x
Posts.Title: will they be able to tell me something on the day of my tests?

Posts.Content: got my MRI date for the 3rd of feb then got to come back next day 4th feb for results and go through exact plans of treatment and start. still waiting for my biopsy results on lymph nodes and mammo from Friday 17th jan. hopefully get them before the weekend x
